Posts.Content: KJohnson wrote: Anybody know of any California health plans for people with pre-existing conditions?  The firm I work for is going out of business and there will be no COBRA health insurance.  My chance of getting individual medical insurance is probably going to be a huge issue.  I am currently cancer free, but I have medication expenses (Arimidex, Zoloft and high blood pressure meds).  Unemployment will basically only cover food and rent.  I am also 60 years old so I am 5 years from medicare.  Any advice will be most appreciated. Cheers, KJ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Loosing Health Insurance KJohnson leaf

Posts.Content: Oct 13, 2008 05:03PM KJohnson wrote: Lita, when I had my pre-surgery MRI, they found a spot on my other breast so I had a biopsy on that side. It turned out negative, fortunately, but it sure is nerve-racking. Best of luck to you.  Kathy J.
Posts.Title: They found another lump during MRI Lita wishiwere
